props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: after
props.description: Optional text that will be shown after the input

props.name: before
props.description: Optional text that will be shown before the input

props.name: autocomplete
props.description: Sets the HTML5 autocomplete mode for the input

props.name: font
props.description: Changes the font of the input to monospace or sans

props.name: pattern
props.description: A regular expression, which will be used to validate the input

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Custom placeholder text, when the field is empty

props.name: spellcheck
props.description: If false, spellchecking will be disabled

props.name: alpha
props.description: Add the alpha value to the color name
